name: Refuse or Defuse
description:
Gamble your way through the holiday season as Santa punishes you for the crimes you did all year round.

This small game is made as a submission for the Christmas Jam 2018 with the theme of "You're on the naughty list"

Credits:

  • Purple Planet Music - Palpitations
  • jalastram - 8-bit Explosions #1
  • dustyroomgames - Casual Game Sounds
